#include<iostream>
int main(){
    int c=0, test,len;
    char sent[101];
    std::cin >> test;

    while(test--){
        std::cin >> sent;
        for(len=0;sent[len] != '\0';len++);
        for(int i=0;i<len;i++){
            if(sent[i]=='A'||sent[i]=='D'||sent[i]=='O'||sent[i]=='P'||sent[i]=='Q'||sent[i]=='R')
                c++;
            else if(sent[i] == 'B')
                c += 2;
        }
        std::cout << c << std::endl;
        c = 0;
    }
}
